name: Mall Madness
description:
You work hard at the local mall Lost & Found.

But, somehow, they forgot you inside when a Zombie Appocalipse is on it's way.

You must now survive and escape using improvised weapons you got on the job.

Use a Toy Hand, a Deck of Cards and The First Vaccinated Patient to kill zombies and find a way out.

How to play

WASD: Move
Left Mouse: Fire
Space: Jump
E: Use
1, 2, 3 and 4:  Select your weapons

Developed to Global Game Jam 2021. Theme: Lost and Found.
